shortDescription: ThinkCMF 5.0.190111 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via the portal/admin_category/addpost.html alias parameter because the mishandling of a single quote character allows data/conf/route.php injection.
vulnerabilityName: thinkcmf thinkcmf Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
